raw_text: DHARMAWARDENA – KOLITHA INDRAJITH – (Senior Attorney-at-Law,​ non Executive Director – Ceylinco Insurance PLC),​ beloved husband of Krishni,​ most loved father of Thavisha and Thamali,​ father-in-law of Peter and Sharendra,​ brother of Kushan,​ brother-in-law of Sherine and Dhananj,​ loving uncle of Dilanka,​ Dinesh. Remains lie at Jayarathne’s from 6.00 p.m. today and cremation takes place tomorrow at 6.00 p.m. at Jawatte Cemetery.080844
